title: @Meddler whats going to happen to Darius, nerfed or left alone, maybe buffed?
body:
He's banned a ton and its annoying, whenever I play Darius the enemy responds with immobile champions. People think he's op and he might be, but everyone seems to forget how kiteable he is. 

Is he going to get his passive nerfed, Q, or will he get his E buffed as it feels unreliable at max range. 

Thoughts?

replies.body: What we do next with Darius depends on how the 5.17 changes affect him, we need to find out how the power the W buff adds to him compares with the power removed by fixing the Q multihit/multiheal bug. He was too strong in 5.16, need to determine his 5.17 state before talking about possible 5.18 changes though.
Speaking of 5.18, if (theoretically) we get a new champion in that patch, will they be available for Worlds or are you guys leery of their balance state?
5.18 won't include a new champion. Even if it did I imagine we'd disable that champion for Worlds.
It won't have "a" new champion. It mighty have two though :P

hey meddler if you are nerfing him, I think the best nerf would be having his Q dmg lowered to 30 at rank one and 120 at rank 5 and make the heal back to 10%.


I feel like those nerf would make him pretty balanced and sit at 49-50% winrate again and stop being banned in ranked.

right now everyone (even in master elo) ppl consider him op because of the heal of his Q.

Can I please make a suggestion?

I think you should make his passive deal magic damage again.
It's synergy with {{item:3071}} is ridiculous... You can just hit a Q, wait a few secs for it to proc then grab and go all in.

He is right now what Olaf was way back. Might seem weak on normals, but on competitive where people can micromanage him and his mechanics he is a FREAKING MONSTER.
At least making his passive magic damage again it will tone down some of his synergy and make his power spike come a bit later.
Maybe instead of magic, just make the amount of bleed per stack really small and change it to true damage (not physical), like Twitch stacks. Just a thought.

He was too strong in 5.16, need to determine his 5.17 state before talking about possible 5.18 changes though.

I will say, I love playing Darius, but he is still too strong at this point. Every game I have played against a Darius since release, he has been more like a TANK and less like a juggernaut. All he needs to do is get plate, and flash q to get the 60% heal off. If you think about it, the delay actually helps Darius because he suffers all the damage while channeling it then gains it right back while dealing damage from those hit. Kiting isn't the issue. Its the second you are caught - no matter what, _**you are dead**_.
Simple fix to that: Don't get caught.
Don't leave base*
Or learn his weaknesses and play against him correctly to the best of your ability.
Was a joke but thanks for the advice I already knew

Not sure if this is possible, but is it possible to buff jungle Darius by making his outer Q heal him for half of what it is on live, capping at 30% still on large monsters? 

So 7.5% missing health each large monster hit(excluding scuttle).

Darius is too strong right now. Sure he's "kiteable" but it doesn't matter when a 5 and 1 Darius at 12 minutes into the game teleports bot and face rolls my support and I. I've yet to play a game in which the side with Darius lost.

They never should have given him sustain. He is much harder to gank now, which is important seeing as he crushes most top laners.

And he's one of my favorite champions before you call me biased.

Darius along with Skarner and occasionally Garen have reached my ban list since I honestly just don't want to have to deal with any of those champions...ever. I've seen people play each of them in the least optimal way possible and they still get kills/win fights. This doesn't seem very balanced in any way.
